column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////As soon as we were seated
column2: the kind waitress confirmed our pizza. It took another hour for the pizza to arrive. What was the point in me ordering earlier only to have to wait another hour for our meal to come out? We ordered the "The Malnati Chicago Classic" and it was... okay. It was layered of crust
column6: and tomatoes. We asked for garlic as an additional add-on. I think if I had not asked for garlic
column7: the experience would not have been "A-OK" per Yelp standards.
